adHeader: Horse Boarding / Barn Available ****Move In Special****
adDetails: Move in Special $100.00 off first Months Board! **Check out our new board pricing @canyoncreekranchcv.com** Canyon Creek Ranch Boarding/Training Facility Premier Boarding Facility Open for Trainers/Boarders Extremely functional boarding facility, Canyon Creek Ranch is now welcoming new boarders and trainers. Large indoor barn holds up to 40 horses with access to trails, gallop/exercise track, eurciser and turn outs. With a large outdoor arena and indoor arena, Canyon Creek Ranch is a phenomenal facility for running a strong training program year round. The indoor arena has brand new rubber footing, perfect for jumping or dressage. Inside the barn you will find large ceiling fans for great air circulation during the hot months as well as two large tack rooms. Unbeatable boarding prices (Full care or self-care available): call with inquiries. Services Include: Feeding Twice Daily: Alfalfa, Grass, Wheat Hay Once a day stall cleaning Fly Control Free Trailer Parking www.canyoncreekranchcv.com show contact info Jim
